sep_float.hpp File Reference

This class stores a float, double or long double as a significand exponent pair. It allows basic arithmetic operations as well as computing the most significant differing bit (used for z-order calculations). More...

 XOR function.

Detailed Description

This class stores a float, double or long double as a significand exponent pair. It allows basic arithmetic operations as well as computing the most significant differing bit (used for z-order calculations).

Function Documentation

template<typename T1 >
void xor_sep_float_sig ( T1 &  a,
T1 &  b,
T1 &  c,
const T1 &  zero 
) [inline]

XOR function.

This templated function computes a bitwise XOR of two sep_float_sig unions, based on the size of the underlying floating point data type.

Parameters:
a First value to be XORed
b Second value to be XORed
c return value
zero A baseline value used to restore the floating point structure after XOR, as far as I know it should always be 0.5
